member.summary: Creates a new city.
member.param: The city data to be created.
member.returns: No content with a 204 No Content status upon successful creation.

member.name: M:Travel_and_Accommodation_Booking_Platform.Controllers.CityController.GetCityById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific city by its unique identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the city.
member.returns: A city data transfer object (DTO).

member.name: M:Travel_and_Accommodation_Booking_Platform.Controllers.CityController.UpdateCity(System.Guid,Application.DTOs.CityDto)
member.summary: Updates a city with the specified ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the city.
The updated city information.
member.returns: No content with a 204 No Content status upon successful update. Bad request with a 400 Bad Request status if the updated city data is null or invalid. Not found with a 404 Not Found status if the city with the specified ID is not found. Internal server error with a 500 status if an unexpected error occurs during the update.

member.name: M:Travel_and_Accommodation_Booking_Platform.Controllers.CityController.PatchCity(System.Guid,Microsoft.AspNetCore.JsonPatch.JsonPatchDocument{Application.DTOs.CityDto})
member.summary: Partially updates a city using JSON Patch.
member.param: The unique identifier of the city.
The JSON Patch document containing partial updates.
member.returns: No content with a 204 No Content status upon successful update. Bad request with a 400 Bad Request status if the patch document is null or invalid. Not found with a 404 Not Found status if the city with the specified ID is not found.

member.summary: Deletes a city with the specified ID.
member.param: The unique identifier of the city to delete.
member.returns: No content with a 204 No Content status upon successful deletion. Not found with a 404 Not Found status if the city with the specified ID is not found. Internal server error with a 500 status if an unexpected error occurs during the deletion.

member.param: The unique identifier of the city.
member.returns: with HTTP status code: - 200 (OK) if hotels are found. - 404 (Not Found) if no hotels are found for the given city ID. - 500 (Internal Server Error) in case of unexpected errors.
